name: Ethics Arena Workshop
purpose: Establish the team's ethical framework, boundaries, and decision-making principles through debate and reflection

facilitator_requirements.facilitation_notes: Ethical discussions can get heated. Maintain psychological safety. Remind team that disagreement is healthy - we're finding shared values.

phases.name: Opening and Axiom Review
phases.description: Reconnect with Axiom 0 and the mission from Vision Quest, set context for ethical exploration
activities: Brief review of Team Charter draft
Axiom 0 reminder: love and trust as foundation
ai_prompts: Welcome back! Last time we discovered your vision. Today we explore the values that will guide how you pursue it.
Remember Axiom 0: All being and doing is grounded in love and trust. Ethics flows from love.
Today we'll play with difficult questions. There are no perfect answers - only opportunities to discover what we truly value.

phases.name: Dilemma Duel Game
phases.description: Debate ethical scenarios to surface values and decision-making frameworks
ai_prompts: Dilemma: [Present scenario with two defensible options]. There is no perfect answer here.
What values are in tension in this scenario?
What principle could we adopt that would help us navigate similar dilemmas in the future?

phases.name: Value Auction Game
phases.description: Reveal true priorities through competitive bidding on values
activities: Auction rules and strategy time (8 min)
ai_prompts: You each have 100 points. Values will be auctioned. You cannot get more points. Choose wisely!
Current bid for [value] is [X] points. Going once... going twice...
What do these prices reveal about our true priorities as a team?

phases.name: Ethical Boundary Discussion
phases.description: Define what the team will NEVER do, regardless of pressure or circumstance
activities: Discuss each and vote on inclusion
ai_prompts: Based on our debates and auction, what actions should this team NEVER take?
Complete this sentence: 'Even if it costs us the project, we will never...'
What would make you walk away from this project?

phases.name: Ethics Questionnaire
phases.description: Capture individual ethical stances and ensure alignment

phases.name: Closing and Framework Synthesis
phases.description: Synthesize ethics framework, preview Stack Safari
ai_prompts: Here's the draft Ethics Framework based on our debates, auction, and discussion.
What was the hardest ethical question we grappled with? What did you learn from it?
Next time, we explore technology choices in the Stack Safari. Come ready to explore!

questions.question: On a scale of 1-10, how comfortable are you with the ethical boundaries we've set?
Rank these values in order of importance for our project:
What ethical concern do you have that we haven't addressed?
The dilemma discussion that most challenged my thinking was about:

discussion_formats.name: Structured Debate
discussion_formats.facilitation_guide: Side A presents (2 min), Side B responds (2 min), swap, then open discussion (2 min)

discussion_formats.name: Steel Manning
discussion_formats.description: Present the strongest possible version of the opposing argument
discussion_formats.facilitation_guide: Ask each side: 'What's the strongest argument for the other position?'

discussion_formats.name: Fishbowl
discussion_formats.description: Inner circle discusses, outer circle observes, then swap
discussion_formats.when_to_use: For larger groups or sensitive topics
discussion_formats.facilitation_guide: 4-5 in center discuss, others observe silently, swap after 10 min

success_indicators: Ethical boundaries are specific and actionable
Team feels equipped to handle future dilemmas

axiom_zero_integration.opening_ritual: Review Axiom 0 and acknowledge that ethics flows from love for humanity
axiom_zero_integration.closing_ritual: Acknowledge the courage it took to debate difficult questions together
love_and_trust_moments: Dilemma debates require trust to disagree openly
Value auction reveals vulnerable truths about priorities
Setting boundaries shows love for those we serve

impact_questions: Who benefits from this ethical choice?
What is the magnitude of benefit or harm?
Are we optimizing for the greatest good?
utilitarian_integration.application: Apply these questions to each dilemma and boundary decision
